reviewText:
I chose 3 * because there was a lot about his wives and children but no interviews with him, nor enough film clips.

I would not recommend to anyone else unless they were a dedicated fan, like myself.
Worth every penny for even the curious of Savalas fans. Needless to say, it goes beyond "Kojak". Who loves it,baby?
My wife and I are big Telly Savalas fans and this biography show is excellent. A very well laid out show that covers his life and career. A very good deal for any fan.
